## getOriginMetadata() function

Get metadata from target object or class by metadata key. If metadata doesn't exist, create a new Map and define it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getOriginMetadata(metadataKey: string | symbol, target: any, propertyKey?: string | symbol): any;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The target object or class


</td></tr>

</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional property key for property or method metadata


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

any

The metadata value associated with the key
